TopicTitle: VTOL Craft (Bell X-22 and Doak VZ-4)

Articles.Content:
I made some VTOL craft based on some real-life experimental ducted-fan craft the US Air Force tested in the 1950s and 1960s.

I used the following mods:

Kerbal Aircraft Expansion (KAX)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76668-0-90-Kerbal-Aircraft-Expansion-%28KAX%29-v2-3-4?highlight=kerbal+aircraft+expansion

Infernal Robotics

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220267-magic-smoke-industries-infernal-robotics-v0-19-3

Tweakscale

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220549-tweakscale

The first one is based on the Bell X-22

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Its real-life counterpart

I couldn't find a cockpit in KSP that looks like the one in the above image... also I almost never see "square" fuselage parts...

Craft file for X-22:

http://www./download/u082h0b5z33lscl/X-22.craft

The next one is based on the Doak VZ-4

Javascript is disabled. View full album
